skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Victorious, Illustrious-class aircraft carrier number two! From the Atlantic Ocean to the Indian Ocean, and even the Pacific... where the ocean breeze goes, I follow!
skins.acquisition: I am the one called Victorious, Aircraft Carrier of the Royal Navy. Yes, sing my name as you herald the coming of the symbol of victory. As long as I am here, our endeavours shall be smooth!
skins.login: The quiet sea, the cool sea breeze... Even in this moment, the birth of new, beautiful things blesses us.
skins.details: In both love and war, one should be brave~ So, be brave, and if you need support, I shall be there!
skins.secretaryIdle1: War is ugly. And this olive wreath is the symbol of peace and beauty.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Tirpitz, if you won't come out and have fun with me then I'll bomb your room again!
skins.secretaryIdle3: I don't like violence, but using it is often the quickest solution to many problems...
skins.secretaryTouch: When you feel down, I also do. Come on, you have someone as beautiful as me beside you, so why not be happy?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Y-you just did "that," didn't you?! B-by "that," I mean...

skins.shipDescription: Hum~ dee dum?~ I'm all dressed up, and my hair is perfect! Commander, I'm ready to go! Don't keep me waiting on a holiday!
skins.acquisition: Hum~ dee dum?~ I'm all dressed up, and my hair is perfect! Commander, I'm ready to go! Don't keep me waiting on a holiday!
skins.login: Way! Too! Slow! Commander, what does your schedule look like today? Hurry up and finish so you can take me shopping!
skins.details: Do you need advice from the beautiful Victorious? Whether it's fashion tips or relationship trouble, you can ask me anything~!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Rest is for the sake of being able to work better! Therefore, set aside that work and come play with me~!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Tirpitz, come and play with me~ I won't do anything to you~!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Stay in tip-top condition so you can work hard and play hard! That's my motto~!
skins.secretaryTouch: This outfit is surprisingly warm... Even in this kind of weather, I don't feel cold at all!
